scripts.local: cp src/settings/const.dev src/module/common/const.ts;npx webpack; node server.js
scripts.dev: cp src/settings/const.dev src/module/common/const.ts;npx webpack; scp -r ./public/* bonsoleil:web/goodsun.tokyo/dao/; scp ./public/.htaccess bonsoleil:web/goodsun.tokyo/dao/
scripts.deploy: cp src/settings/const.prd src/module/common/const.ts;npx webpack; aws s3 sync ./public s3://bizendao
